params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.fields
params.description: The map's fields. The map keys represent field names. Field names matching the regular expression __.*__ are reserved. Reserved field names are forbidden except in certain documented contexts. The map keys, represented as UTF-8, must not exceed 1,500 bytes and cannot be empty.

methods.name: getFields

The map keys represent field names. Field names matching the regular expression __.*__ are reserved. Reserved field names are forbidden except in certain documented contexts. The map keys, represented as UTF-8, must not exceed 1,500 bytes and cannot be empty.
